pageContext.claim: “If the Democrats do not give us the votes to secure our Country, the Military will build the remaining sections of the Wall.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims he can circumvent Congress by getting the military to build the wall. But there’s not a lot of room to maneuver without money. Whether it’s the military, a private contractor or anyone else building the wall, funding would be necessary. The constitution says, “no money shall be drawn from the Treasury, but in consequence of appropriations made by law.” Congress and the president must both approve appropriations.
